headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on KLA Corporation on StockOpine’s Newsletter’s Substack by StockOpine. As of 1st July, KLA Corporation’s share was trading at $898.85. KLAC’s trailing and forward P/E were 32.7 and 26.96 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. KLA Corporation, a leader in process control and optical inspection for the semiconductor industry, has […]

headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC) Hits Fresh High: Is There Still Room to Run?
summary: KLA (KLAC) is at a 52-week high, but can investors hope for more gains in the future? We take a look at the company's fundamentals for clues.

headline: JPMorgan Reiterates Overweight on KLA (KLAC) as Process Control Sales Lead WFE Growth
summary: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) ranks among the 20 best fast growth stocks to invest in. JPMorgan analysts maintained their price target of $900 and reiterated their Overweight rating on KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) on June 3. This update is in line with the ongoing success of wafer front end (WFE) equipment sales, which increased by 6-8% in […]
